abstract: The Texas governor files paperwork to run in New Hampshire's Republican primary, and reconsiders the debates.
snippet: The Texas governor files paperwork to run in New Hampshire's Republican primary, and reconsiders the debates.
lead_paragraph: CONCORD, N.H. -- Will he or won't he? Gov. Rick Perry of Texas, who suggested this week that it might have been a mistake to attend all the Republican debates and that he might not participate in some coming ones, now says he could be open to attending more.

headline.main: On Debates, Put Perry Down as a 'Maybe'
